name: Shikimori Micchon (Kawaii dake ja Nai Shikimori-san) LoRA
description:
1. Kawaii dake ja Nai Shikimori-san model. 💒

Shikimori Micchon LoRA.

Works well with a weight around 0.7-0.8.

Got some really nice results with MeinaMix.
But it works great on other models too. Would love reviews and see what can be generated with this.

meta.prompt: <lora:MicchonShikimori:0.7>,high res, masterpiece,Micchon Shikimori, pink hair, solo, 1girl,outside,deatailed background, detailed eyes, ((blue eyes))
